text: Hello all, new to HubSpot. Is there a global way to disable fonts and font size on the rich text editor? Or does it have it to be done per module with the enabled list? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields/rich-text-editor|As described here>

So this is only for modules that are created and have the rich text field in them. This configuration wouldnt apply to the default rich text module that is available for users or for rich text in the HubDB rich text column.

That being said, you can totally create a custom module called “(Company Name) Rich text” and then via local development, configure the fields you want to have in the WYSIWYG toolbar for it.

Let me know if this helps answer your question Kris.
<@ULSCN5SSW> there is actually a beta that allows you to create custom Products properties, just like the other CRM objects
Does it say bash command not found?
